See more Fly with Ethiopian to Victoria Falls and Enjoy 35% Discount at the Palm River Hotel. Valid for bookings between 1st January 2023 and 31st March 2023. Valid for bookings between 1st January 2023 and 31st March 2023. Passengers shall secure their ticket number when booking direct through the Palm River Hotel’s reservations team. Full payment is due 30

urls.title: Extra baggage
urls.description: You aren' t registered yet? Join the program for free and start enjoying the benefits for flights made 90 days back. Excess and Special Baggage Purchase additional baggage at ethiopianairlines.com. You can also purchase it from Ethiopian ticketing offices, Ethiopian Global Contact Center, Ethiopian agents and Ethiopian Airport. If you have already booked a flight with Ethiopian, you can purchase your excess baggage using MANAGE BOOKING Ethiopian Airlines Baggage Policy for Excess baggage rate. Learn

data.text:
Pay for Your Excess Baggage Online and Benefit More
If you would like to take more baggage than the standard baggage allowance, you can buy it online at Ethiopian website or mobile app and minimize the check-in queue at airport
Link:   https://t.co/Ux6v4cSUX0 https://t.co/si2iakDxMN

urls.title: Myshebaspace
urls.description: Cookie usage notification: We use owned and third-party cookies to improve our services. If you continue to browse, we consider you accept this use. See more Get the most comfortable seat in Economy: MyShebaSpace. You can now guarantee that no one sits next to you on your flight. Reserve one or more empty seats beside you now, and look forward to your journey. ● Room to stretch out, lay-down, or anything in between 1. Check if your flight is eligible. MyShebaSpace is available for purchase 72-2 Hours

data.text:

urls.title: Car Rental and Airport Transfer
urls.description: You aren' t registered yet? Join the program for free and start enjoying the benefits for flights made 90 days back. Complete your travel plans by booking your Car Rental and Airport Transfer through our partner Car Trawler. Our Airport Transfer service includes but not limited to taxis, ride-hailing services, transfer services, and chauffeur drive vehicle rental, private transfers, business class transfers, first-class transfers, bus, and mini bus transfers, train transfers, and limousine transfers.

data.text:
We care for your ground transport as well.
Rent vehicles and book ground transportation services including taxis and ride-hailing services, airport transfer services, and chauffeur-driven vehicle rental, among others at your destination.
https://t.co/48zwneR5gZ https://t.co/AkIgFihbkp

urls.title: Fly Ethiopian (@fly.ethiopian) • Instagram photos and videos
Ethiopian Airlines | LinkedIn
urls.description: Ethiopian Airlines | 177,591 followers on LinkedIn. The New Spirit of Africa | Ethiopian Airlines Group (Ethiopian) is the fastest growing Airline Group in Africa. In its seventy plus years of operation, Ethiopian has become one of the continent’s leading carriers, unrivaled in efficiency and operational success. Ethiopian commands the lion’s share of the Pan-African passenger and cargo network operating the youngest and most modern fleet to more than 127 international passenger and cargo destinations across five continents.

urls.title: Home
urls.description: Ethiopian Airline Aviation Academy is a world class Aviation Training Center equipped with state of the art and best in class training equipment and technology offering full range of Aviation Training Programs.

data.text:
As you move toward a dream, the dream moves toward you! Join the Ethiopian Aviation Academy, a #centreofexcellence
https://t.co/wEdyOQZstj https://t.co/fneP7uVXEp

increasing trade in the sector and availing products to the world market to gain international recognition. It is said that it is possible to earn up to 400 million dollars a year just by selling various products to the customers that Ethiopian Airlines transports. (2/2)

The Ministry of Industry, together with Ethiopian Airlines and its partners, has officially inaugurated a duty-free leather and leather products store at Bole International Airport. The launching of this store is with the purpose of promoting Ethiopian products, (1/2) https://t.co/ckwmCDBeVj
